Description: Fragment of oval handle from a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine pink-brown; light purple core; mixed inclusions. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription.
Curator's comments: Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p.53, 1. Trimmed. From same die as Athenian Agora SS10824 and others.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0154)
